NAME       :

DEEPAK S J

ADDRESS :

1607#42 GND FLOOR, 5TH CROSS, 5TH BLOCK, SMV BDA LAYOUT, 
ULLAL UPNAGARA, BANGALORE - 56

DIPLOMA CET ENTRANCE TEST  - TIME TABLE

DATE & DAY

TIMINGS

SUBJECT

INVIGILATOR'S 
SIGNATURE

20-11-2022  
SUNDAY

10:00 AM TO 
1:00 PM

Applied Science and Applied 
Mathematics

Permission for evening  engineering college is withdrawn, however 
candidates can opt for day colleges. Diploma Common Entrance Test 
is mandatory.

Note: Kannada Language Test is only to those candidates who have 
applied under eligibility clause of 'c' and 'd'.

DCET EXAMINATION CENTRE 
NAME AND ADDRESS

VEDANTHA PU COLLEGE, 
SHARDANAGAR VASANTHAPURA 
MAIN ROAD 
VASANTHAPURBANGALORE- 
560061

Executive Director

INSTRUCTIONS

In view of delay in arrival by bus, train etc. 
candidates are advised to take extra precautions in 
reaching the examination centre before the 
scheduled time.

Candidates should not carry any Modern Electronic 
Equipments, Gadgets, Pagers, Mobile Phones, 
Bluetooth, Markers, White Fluid, Calculator, Wireless 
sets, bits of paper, books / note etc. into the 
Examination Hall, as these items are prohibited for 
use in the examination hall.  

Along with the Admission Ticket candidate must 
carry any one Valid Identity Card like Driving License 
/ Passport / Aadhar Card / PAN Card / Voter ID / 
Final Year Diploma Exam. Admission Ticket, 
compulsorily. 

The candidates are not allowed to wear / carry any 
type of wrist watch to the examination hall / room. 
Candidates are informed to check the Bell Timings 
hosted on the KEA Website for Caution Bells at 
different intervals.

(cid:178)ಾಜರುಪ(cid:291)(cid:318)ದ(cid:170)ೆ (cid:168)ಾತ(cid:206) ಅಭ(cid:205)(cid:295)(cid:143)ಯನು(cid:199) ಪ(cid:312)ೕ(cid:271)ಾ (cid:144)ೊಠ(cid:291)(cid:372)ಳ(cid:146)ೆ ಪ(cid:206)(cid:174)ೇ(cid:316)ಸಲು 

They are required to occupy their respective seats in 
the Examination Hall immediately after the First Bell 
i.e., after 9.40 a.m.

ಅಭ(cid:205)(cid:295)(cid:143)ಗಳ(cid:133) ಪ(cid:312)ೕ(cid:271)ೆ (cid:164)ಾ(cid:206)ರಂಭ(cid:174)ಾಗುವ (cid:363)ದಲ(cid:163)ೆಯ (cid:166)ೆ(cid:351) ಆದ ತ(cid:269)ಣ ಅಂದ(cid:170)ೆ (cid:166)ೆ. 

೯.೪೦ ನಂತರ ಪ(cid:312)ೕ(cid:271)ಾ (cid:144)ೊಠ(cid:291)ಯನು(cid:199) ಪ(cid:206)(cid:174)ೇ(cid:316)(cid:318) ತಮ(cid:204) (cid:298)ಗ(cid:296)ತ ಆಸನಗಳ(cid:313)(cid:208) 

(cid:304)ಡ(cid:172)ಾಗುವ(cid:131)ದು.

Candidates will not be allowed to enter the 
Examination Hall after the Third Bell i.e. after 10.00 
a.m 

The candidate should use only Blue or Black ink ball 
point pens.

Candidates have to write their name on the OMR 
Answer Sheet issued to them after the first bell. 

Afterwards, candidates have to enter the DCET 
Number, Group Code and shade the respective 
circles on the OMR answer sheet as per bell timings 
/ instructions.  

Candidates have to enter the Version Code and 
Serial Number of the Question Booklet on the OMR 
answer sheet and the respective circles should also 
be shaded completely.

Candidates should carefully enter the “Question 
Booklet Version Code / Serial Number” on the 
nominal roll. 

Candidates should carefully enter the “Answer Sheet 
Serial Number” on the nominal roll. 

Candidates will not be allowed to leave the 
Examination Hall till completion of exam scheduled 
time.

Candidates are strictly advised to preserve this 
‘Admission Ticket’ carefully and produce whenever it 
is required.

Visit KEA Website http://kea.kar.nic.in for schedule 
of Bell Timings and other DCET details.
